original_text: And the Lord of hosts shall stir up a scourge for him according to the slaughter of Midian at the rock of Oreb: and as his rod was upon the sea, so shall he lift it up after the manner of Egypt.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 채찍을 들어 그를 치시되 오렙 바위에서 미디안을 쳐죽이신 것 같이 하실 것이며 막대기를 드시되 바다를 향하여 애굽에서 하신 것 같이 하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord of hosts shall stir up a scourge for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만군의 주께서 그를 위해 채찍을 일으키시리라

sentences.original_text: according to the slaughter of Midian
and as his rod was upon the sea,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 지팡이가 바다 위에 있었던 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so shall he lift it up
